body.name: 3-Link Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, Battery Powered Cameras for Home Security, No Monthly Fee, Motion-Activated Spotlight, Motion Detection Alert, Night Vision, Works with Alexa, 2.4G Wi-Fi Only
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 27 mins
features: No Monthly Fee: SD card storage & Cloud storage available for home security motion detection recording clips, you could choose anyone without additional costs.
Motion-Activated Spotlight: Once motion is detected, the security camera's spotlight will light up to notify strangers outdoor to stay away from your home.
Motion Detection Alert: When detecting someone near your home, the wireless security camera will send you a message alert via the app and record their movements.
Night Vision: Built-in infrared LEDs, the home security camera could provide clear night vision even in the dark
Works with Alexa: After home camera conneted to Alexa, you could use your voice to engage live view, arm and disarm your security camera. ((5G Wi-Fi not compatible)

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 43 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with my camera
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, good instructions, clear video. I love the alarm to scare intruders. Good quality. Very affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Entry Level IP Camera
reviews.reviewText: This camera, by far, offers the best night vision of any of my more expensive cameras. Truth be told, I think the app and GUI need some debugging, I still would recommend this camera without hesitation. The price is FANTASTIC and the quality good. The Ingress protection (IP) is not implemented in a way conducive to a connected power supply, so recharging is necessary, but the battery life is very reasonable. Customer Service also appears to be very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You can't beat this camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a "chicken cam" to keep an eye on my girls. The instructions for setup are minimal, but I was able to figure it out. I have a small iPhone, and the app is cut off/off center so I can't sign in from it. But it works great on my iPad. The images are quite good, and I was impressed with the night vision option. The motion detector picked up a mouse running across the pen, so it is quite good. Battery charge is okay, I will probably add a solar panel at some point. I am quite happy with it overall; it does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wow this is a great little camera, easy to install beautiful picture works great I just put it in today we'll see how it goes so far I really like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Install and use
reviews.reviewText: Good quality picture, easy to use up, quick instalation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only works with iphone. I tried to use the app but it would not let me sign up.
reviews.reviewText: Disappointed that it wasn't stated that camera only works with iphone or ipad. Have to return. Found out after purchasing and searching online, the app works with iPhone only.Now I have to pay $7.99 for UPS return. I tried contacting Customer support. No answer. I feel they owe me for shipping return cost.Buyer BEWARE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to put a camera up for extra security in my backyard. The quality is great, and the night view can be adjusted with a toggle on the spotlight or you can turn the spotlight off and just have infrared on. The microphone picks up sound several feet away. I definitely feel better about having this set up! Now just to test the weather proof claim with the frigid temps we’re getting ready to get. I’m definitely going to get another camera!Edit to add that the camera is still working in subzero temps! One of the best purchases I’ve made.Edited to add again the camera stopped working but the email support team was quick to respond and have issued a new camera, that is back up and working again! Definitely will be getting another one for my front yard!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I really like how affordable this camera is. I bought one to use for my front door and loved it so much I purchased two more for my garage and back door. I think this is a great device with many features and I really like how it saves to a cloud and you get a free 36 month subscription.
